entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:23 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of hail this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind light except north 30 km/h gusting to 50 over southern sections overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind light except north 30 km/h gusting to 50 over southern sections in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.summary: Periods of rain. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
